name: Valiant Soul
description:
To recognize one's own shortcomings and dare to defy the giants of steel and thunder is the truest sign of a Valiant Soul. 

- Catanian proverb

I just want to say a few things.

The game is a bit jank but it's by far the project I've worked the hardest on. I thought of giving up many times and had to make many compromises. The final result is something I am proud of. I really put my heart and soul into this and I really hope people will be able to see that.

As far as I know, I have used all assets that are under a free license. However, in case your work has ended up in my project without your knowledge, please contact me privately and I will settle the matter as soon as possible.
